en: Miss Jane Bowles, 1775-6, The Wallace Collection

Some additional images which are referred to in the Catalogue entries of the Technical Bulletin can be viewed by following the links below.

en: M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, , 91 x 70.9 cm, after cleaning and restoration. The Wallace Collection. (7728x5686px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, ultraviolet fluorescence image, after cleaning. The Wallace Collection. (7730x5413px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic). The Wallace Collection. (11117x8850px)

M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic), with the effect of the painting stretcher reduced by digital manipulation. The Wallace Collection. (11117x8850px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, infrared reflectogram (OSIRIS). The Wallace Collection. (4016x3204px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, photomicrograph of decoration on the sitter's right shoulder. The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, photomicrograph of decoration on the sitter's right shoulder. The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from sleeve, showing almost pure white paint over a beige underlayer.  The Wallace Collection. (1224x4128px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from sleeve, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1224x4128px)

M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, photomicrograph of foliage in the background, left side, showing brown translucent 'glaze-like' paint applied over more opaque yellow and green underlayers.  The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from background, upper left.  The Wallace Collection. (1140x4164px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from background, upper left, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1140x4164px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from dark background, left of sitter's head, level with cheek.  The Wallace Collection. (1908x4164px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from dark background, left of sitter's head, level with cheek, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1908x4164px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from dark background, left of sitter's head, level with bow in hair.  The Wallace Collection. (1488x4164px)

M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from dark background, left of sitter's head, level with bow in hair, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1488x4164px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from foliage in the background, near to the top edge. The Wallace Collection. (1116x4152px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from foliage in the background, near to the top edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1116x4152px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, photomicrograph of the cream coloured lining of the overskirt, showing the brown glaze over the surface.   The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, un-mounted fragment of glaze from lining of overskirt, photographed in transmitted light. The Wallace Collection. (1920x2124px)
M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from lining of overskirt. The Wallace Collection. (1620x4152px)

M1400: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Jane Bowles, paint cross-section from lining of overskirt, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The thick wax layer above the paint is less fluorescent then the subsequent layers of varnish.  The two glaze layers appear darker and have a weak orange fluorescence. The Wallace Collection. (1620x4152px)
